lines: *You and Frankie show up at the movies*
'Hey Protag-san! It's good to see you!'
'Alright, so we need to do some more research here for our group project! What movie should we see?'
'Great idea! Let's go see The Notebook!'
*You and Frankie go see The Notebook*
'Great idea! Let's go see Chicken Run 2!'
*You and Frankie go see Chicken Run 2*
'Wow! That movie was great. What did you think?'
options: I loved it! I'm glad we got to do this together...
Woulda been better with more violence.
It was great! I only wish I wore looser pants!

lines: 'Yea! It was really nice. I'm glad I got to hold your hand during the scary parts...'
Oh, really? I didn't think so...
'What? Why would you say that?'
'Anyway...'
Well, this was nice!
'Yea, it was!'
options: It's almost like it was a date...
Well, we certainly have enough information for our project!
Listen, you're nice and all, but... I don't think this should go any further.

lines: 'Haha, yea! If it was a date, it sure would've been nice...'
In that case, maybe we could do a date for real?
'That would be nice!'
'Oh, yea. The project.'
GAME OVER: Bag Fumbled Ending
'Oh! Ok... I see how you feel.'
options: Maybe if you worked harder and were generally better I would like you more.

lines: 'Sure. That would be nice...'
GAME OVER: Let Her Down Easy Ending
'What? But Protag, I would go to the ends of the earth for you!'
Oh yea?
